title: Quantum Beginning
description: Our knowledge and understanding of the Universe increases immensely every day. What would happen if astrophysicists in the not too distant future have access to a quantum computer with all the accumulated knowledge available on the net? This novel explores the possibilities when a team from the University of Texas get a chance to use their new simulation program on the super-powerful quantum computer. This book will challenge. What unfolds in the quantum computer is thought provoking There is a twist that will make readers question, "What is reality and where do we fit into it?"
author: Scott Follett
